mosinstall.name: WysiwygPro
mosinstall.author: Chris Bolt
mosinstall.description: WysiwygPro is a cross browser and cross platform HTML WYSIWYG editing component for PHP.

param.name: fixed_width
param.label: Use Fixed Width
param.description: Enable this option if your template design does not allow enough width for the editor.

param.name: html_version
param.label: HTML Output
param.description: The HTML specification that generated HTML should conform to.

param.name: line_returns
param.label: Line Returns
param.description: Whether to use P tags or DIV tags when you press enter.

param.name: full_urls
param.label: URL Schema
param.description: Whether to use full or relative URLs.

param.name: content_links
param.label: Content Links
param.description: If enabled you will be able to select from a list of direct links to content items when creating a hyperlink.

param.name: image_manager
param.label: Image Manager
param.description: Whether to use the full image file manager or just the image properties editor.

param.name: permissions
param.label: User Permissions
param.description: If the image manager is enabled this sets whether users can upload and delete images.

param.name: document_types
param.label: Allowed Document Types
param.description: Document file types that are allowed for upload, separate with a comma.

param.name: max_document_size
param.label: Max Document Size
param.description: The maximum allowed size of uploaded documents specified in bytes.

param.name: image_types
param.label: Allowed Image Types
param.description: Image file types that are allowed for upload, separate with a comma.

param.name: max_image_size
param.label: Max Image Size
param.description: The maximum allowed size of uploaded images specified in bytes.

param.name: max_image_width
param.label: Max Image Width
param.description: The maximum allowed width of uploaded images specified in pixels.

param.name: max_image_height
param.label: Max Image Height
param.description: The maximum allowed height of uploaded images specified in pixels.

param.name: stylesheet
param.label: Stylesheet URL
param.description: The URL of the stylesheet you want WysiwygPro to use to render HTML. Leave blank for automatic detection of your default template stylesheet.

param.name: colors
param.label: Color Swatches
param.description: A comma separated list of color swatches to appear on the color picker. Leave blank for the default set. Example: #fffff2, #f2f2f2

param.name: formats
param.label: Formats
param.description: A comma separated list of format tags for the format menu. Leave blank for the default set. Example: p, h1, h2, h3

param.name: fonts
param.label: Fonts
param.description: A semi-colon separated list of fonts for the font menu. Leave blank for the default set. This list is semi-colon separated so that you can use a comma to separate alternative fonts. Example: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; Webdings

param.name: sizes
param.label: Font Sizes
param.description: A comma separated list of font sizes (numbers from 1-7) for the font size menu. Leave blank for the default set. Example: 1, 2, 3, 4

param.name: classes
param.label: Classes
param.description: A comma separated list of classes for the class menu. Leave blank to disable this feature. Some classes used by Mambo are: small, smalldark, contentheading, componentheading, moscode, message

param.name: snippet1_html
param.label: Snippet 1 HTML
param.description: A snippet of HTML code which you use often so would like available on the Insert a Custom Object tool.

param.name: snippet1_label
param.label: Snippet 1 Label
param.description: Label for Snippet 1 so that you can quickly identify it.
